fno: Turnover on the National Stock Exchange's futures & options (F&O) segment was Rs 291.05 lakh crore compared with Rs 188.42 lakh crore reported in the previous session. In the cash market, the Nifty 50 declined 189.60 points or 1.04% to settle at 18,042.95. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, advanced 5.64% to 15.1975. IndusInd Bank, ICICI Bank and Reliance Industries (RIL) were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The January 2022 F&O contracts will expire on 25 January 2022.
